sentences.en: All the major gods mentioned above assumed human forms of peerless beauty and grace.
sentences.cn: 以上提到的重要的神均化为人形,容貌秀丽,体态端庄,无人可比.

sentences.en: For all this amazing, this young guy The spring has a peerless and superior fitness.
sentences.cn: 这一切让所有人惊叹, 这个年轻的家伙有着绝世的弹跳力和超强的身体素质.

sentences.en: His Chinese kung fu is peerless.
sentences.cn: 他的中国功夫是无敌的。

sentences.en: How peerless is the Light that in Him shines!
sentences.cn: 他闪耀的光是多么地出类拔萃!

sentences.en: Its artistically gorgeous exterior and peerless luxury and comfort have won it many fans.
sentences.cn: 艺术品般的华丽外形和无与伦比的豪华舒适是它赢得消费者青睐的法宝.

sentences.en: Ji Xiaolan was a peerless intellect of his time.
sentences.cn: 纪晓岚是他那个时代的盖世奇才.

sentences.en: Once fitness is created, natural selection is peerless for winnowing out the duds.
sentences.cn: 一旦创立了适合度, 自然选择去粗汰劣的势头就无可匹敌了.

sentences.en: People say: " Guilin's scenery is peerless in the world . " It was not until I visited the place that I found it really worthy of the reputation.
sentences.cn: 人们都说 “ 桂林山水甲天下 ”,到桂林一看,果然名不虚传.

sentences.en: Production workers Xinlingshouqiao , pure handmade crafts skills, products can be designed peerless crafts.
sentences.cn: 生产工人心灵手巧, 纯手工制作工艺精湛, 产品堪称是精美绝伦的工艺品.

sentences.en: The longan repairs the brains, this type of beverage, be: Peerless beverage.
sentences.cn: 龙眼补脑汁, 这一种饮料, 就是: 盖世无双的饮料.

sentences.en: the peerless blues musician B.B. King
sentences.cn: 举世无双的蓝调音乐家比比金

sentences.en: Zealots are peerless templar warriors who have yet to achieve the uppermost ranks of the Khala.
sentences.cn: 狂热者们都是尚未达到Khala最高级别但武艺高超的圣堂武士.

words.tran_cn: 无与伦比的；出类拔萃的；无比的

trans.tran_cn: 无与伦比的，盖世无双的，天下第一，无可匹敌，无敌于天下
